name: v0.5.1
body:
## What's Changed
* add more info about migration by @rromanchuk in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/67
* Update documentation by @AdrianBinDC in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/70
* Resolve build settings to see if `PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER` is present by @chuganzy in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/71
* Bump jmespath from 1.4.0 to 1.6.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/73
* Fix ignore configuration when we use increment_build_number or  increment_app_version in xcodeproj with target and build_configuration_name by @skiritsa in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/69

## New Contributors
* @rromanchuk made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/67
* @AdrianBinDC made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/70
* @chuganzy made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/71
* @skiritsa made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/69

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* github actions' support for ci_build_number by @partikus in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/61
* Fix for "get_app_store_version_number" for apps with limited availability by @stef-t in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/65

## New Contributors
* @partikus made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/61
* @stef-t made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/65

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/compare/0.4.6...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.6
body:
## What's Changed
* bumps gemfile by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/44
* Bump excon from 0.68.0 to 0.71.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/46
* Bump rake from 12.3.1 to 13.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/49
* Fixes increment_build_number_in_xcodeproj in xocde 11 by @prathmeshranaut in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/48
* Bump json from 2.2.0 to 2.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/54
* Bugfix/#52 target and build config name crash by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/56
* Fix increment_version_number_in_xcodeproj crashing when including the scheme and build configuration by @neilb01 in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/64
* Bugfix -  swiftpm buildfile by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/66

## New Contributors
* @prathmeshranaut made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/48
* @neilb01 made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/64

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/compare/v0.4.2...0.4.6

name: v0.4.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Feature/gitlab pipeline iid suport by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/40
* fixes target based build / version xcodeproj actions. by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.2

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add support for reading Bitrise CI build numbers by @L-Yeiser in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/28
* Copy paste fixes by @georgmay in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/27
* Add extra check when resolving INFOPLIST_FILE and fail with a meaningful error message by @iby in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/24
* Support AppVeyor build number in ci_build_number by @dotdoom in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/33
* Bump rubyzip from 1.2.1 to 1.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/35
* [Feature] - xcode11 project build / version number build setting support by @jdouglas-nz in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/39

## New Contributors
* @L-Yeiser made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/28
* @georgmay made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/27
* @iby made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/24
* @dotdoom made their first contribution in https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/pull/33

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SiarheiFedartsou/fastlane-plugin-versioning/compare/v0.3.4...v0.4.0
